history.proof: intros m z H1 H2 p. destruct (period_lub m z H1 H2) as [H3 [H4 H5]]. split. qsimpl. qsimpl use: degree_diff. - srun best use: degree_pos. - srun best use: degree_per, degree_diff.

ctx: intros m z H1 H2 p.
destruct (period_lub m z H1 H2) as [H3 [H4 H5]].
split.
exceptions.exn: In environment m : fmap z : dart H1 : inv_hmap m H2 : exd m z p := degree m z : nat H3 : 0 < Iter_upb m z H4 : Iter (f m) (Iter_upb m z) z = z H5 : forall i : nat, 0 < i < Iter_upb m z -> Iter (f m) i z <> z Unable to unify "0 < Iter_upb m z" with "0 < p".

ctx: intros m z H1 H2 p.
destruct (period_lub m z H1 H2) as [H3 [H4 H5]].
split.
qsimpl.
exceptions.exn: Not an inductive goal with 1 constructor.

ctx: intros m z H1 H2 p.
destruct (period_lub m z H1 H2) as [H3 [H4 H5]].
split.
qsimpl.
exceptions.exn: In environment m : fmap z : dart H1 : inv_hmap m H2 : exd m z H3 : 0 < Iter_upb m z H4 : Iter (f m) (Iter_upb m z) z = z H : forall i : nat, 0 < i -> i < Iter_upb m z -> Iter (f m) i z = z -> False Unable to unify "Iter (f m) (Iter_upb m z) z = z" with "0 < degree m z".

ctx: intros m z H1 H2 p.
destruct (period_lub m z H1 H2) as [H3 [H4 H5]].
split.
qsimpl.
intros m z H1 H2 p.
destruct (period_lub m z H1 H2) as [H3 [H4 H5]].
split.
qsimpl.
exceptions.tactic: apply degree_diff in H2; try auto.
exceptions.exn: Unable to find an instance for the variable i.

ctx: intros m z H1 H2 p.
destruct (period_lub m z H1 H2) as [H3 [H4 H5]].
split.
qsimpl.
qsimpl use: degree_diff.
exceptions.exn: In environment m : fmap z : dart H1 : inv_hmap m H2 : exd m z H3 : 0 < Iter_upb m z H4 : Iter (f m) (Iter_upb m z) z = z H : forall i : nat, 0 < i -> i < Iter_upb m z -> Iter (f m) i z = z -> False H0 : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> forall i : nat, 0 < i -> i < degree m z -> Iter (f m) i z = z -> False Unable to unify "exd m z" with "0 < degree m z".

original: intros m z H1 H2 p. destruct (period_lub m z H1 H2) as [H3 [H4 H5]]. split. apply H3. split. apply H4. intros i H6. apply degree_diff in H2; try auto. apply H2.
